results.adx_keywords: News and News Media;Social Media;Trump, Donald J;United States Politics and Government

media.caption: President Trump has taken up semipermanent residence on every media outlet of any kind, political or not.

results.abstract: Coverage of President Trump may eclipse that of any single human being ever. I discovered several truths about our digital media ecosystem when I tuned it out.
results.title: I Ignored Trump News for a Week. Here’s What I Learned.
